name: Conti Ransomware Execution
query: (process.command_line:/.*\-[Mm]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Nn][Ee][Tt]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Ss][Ii][Zz][Ee]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Nn][Oo][Mm][Uu][Tt][Ee][Xx]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Pp]\ \\\\\*/ AND process.command_line:/.*$.*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*\-m\ * AND process.command_line:*\-net\ * AND process.command_line:*\-size\ * AND process.command_line:*\-nomutex\ * AND process.command_line:*\-p\ \\\\\* AND process.command_line:*$*)`
